metadata.title: CVE-2018-11728 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The libfsntfs_reparse_point_values_read_data function in libfsntfs_reparse_point_values.c in libfsntfs through 2018-04-20 allows remote attackers to cause an information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted ntfs file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/libfsntfs issue 8 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: libfsntfs package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20190104-1').
